entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
